alert.note: Alert for Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 13 at 8:03PM CDT until July 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... North Canadian River near Woodward affecting Woodward County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...North Canadian River near Woodward. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Shallow flooding of lowlands occurs along the river from the northwestern through the central and southeastern sections of Woodward County. Cattle and other property should be moved to locations higher than nearby river banks to avoid being stranded for hours by high water in side channels. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The North Canadian River is expected to fall. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 815 AM CDT.
